ModMetaData.name: RePower GloomyFurniture Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches GloomyFurniture benches for using the RePower system:
Electric stove (10W Idle, 800W Active) Electric tailor bench (10W Idle, 400W Active) Electric smithy (10W Idle, 500W Active)
Support-chat here: https://s.team/chat/KUDuzMGR
